subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt of Jamaica, a six-time Olympic gold medalist, will retire after the 2017 world championships in London, he told The Daily Mail, a British newspaper.
snippet: Usain Bolt of Jamaica, a six-time Olympic gold medalist, will retire after the 2017 world championships in London, he told The Daily Mail, a British newspaper.
